document_data.name: The Road House
document_data.mainbody: '''The Road House''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Fellowship of Carters and Coachmen]].<ref>
document_data.Location: This guild hall was located on [[Carters' Way]], in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls in the Southern Ward, this building was used as a landmark by locals.<ref>
